svg.style: max-height: 161.33px; min-height: 161.33px; height: 161.33px; max-width: 318.594px; min-width: 318.594px; width: 318.594px;

span.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0); font-size: 24px; font-weight: 600; font-family: serif; text-align: center;

div.span: Lorem ipsum dolor, sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Quibusdam delectus harum dolorum ipsum. Ad, ipsum ex!
